Koga Shuko/Manterror/Injector/Double Punch/Nemesis Enforcer/Unitron:

::Koga Shuko sighed::
"That idiot has probably already doomed the timeline.  <Unitron, report to 
the bridge, NOW!>
"Killer, stay here.  I have a plan.  Set, let Hell Beast and his minions 
enter.  I have a plan.  Then activate the outer intercom, deactivate all 
weapons, and ask the Maximals to hold their fire.  Open the hatch of the 
ship, and invite them in, telling them over the intercom that we are from the 
Tripredacus Council, here to arrest Hell Beast and bring the Maximals back, 
that we are in a joint mission with the Maximal Elders, but only we possessed 
the transwarp technology.  If they ask for an explanation, tell them we were 
a little jumpy after the crash, and our sensors were malfuctioning, and gave 
us wrong data, and we didn't realize the folly until we sent men out to 
counter attack.  Then quickly tell Hell Beast of our plot, and when the 
Maximals are dead, activate our defense systems and rush the Predacons!"

::Unitron walked up onto the bridge::
"Your orders, Shuko?" Unitron asked, looking almost like a complete duplicate 
of Unicron, standing at 10 ft high, his body orange, white, silver, black, 
and red, two wings (skeleton like) resembling a bats extending from his back.

"Prepare our gestalt team.  We are about to ambush the Maximals!"

=======

::Double Punch, Injector, and Manterror headed for where Hell Beast had gone, 
not wanting to miss out on the fun::

=======

::Nemesis put his laser cutter in subspace, smiling, as he heard one of the 
other Alliance members talk about a Predacon ship crashing in Egypt::
"Zardus, we can't pass this oppertunity up.  If we strike now, their 
technology, or loyalty could be ours!"
